copy.wildernessItemAlert: Oops! You can't give your Wilderness ingredients!
copy.notEnoughItemsAlert: Please pick some items to trade!
copy.errorNoName: Please select the friend you wish to send a #GIFTTYPE# to.
copy.errorNoMessage: Please select the message you want your friend to see.
copy.errorNoCurrency: Sorry, you need more Pixie Diamonds.
copy.noIngredientsText: You have no ingredients to trade!
copy.overMaxItems: You can only hold 10,000 #GETNAME# in your pouch.
copy.wouldPutOverMaxItems: This trade with #GIVENAME# will put you over the limit for #GETNAME#.
copy.selectFairyMessaging_noOfflineFriends: None of your friends are currently offline from Pixie Hollow. You can still send Gift Sets and Postcards to your Online friends.
copy.selectFairyMessaging_noOlineFriends: None of your friends are currently online in Pixie Hollow. You can still send Gift Sets and Postcards to your Offline friends.
copy.fairyGenderSparrowmen: Sorry, you can't send Sparrow Man items to a Fairy.
copy.fairyGenderFairy: Sorry, you can't send Fairy items to a Sparrow Man.
copy.currencySelectorTitle: How would you like to pay?
copy.currencySelectorDiamond: Gift Set items you get with Pixie Diamonds become Diamond Items and can be shared with any of your friends!
copy.currencySelectorIngredient: Gift Set items you get with Ingredients can only be shared with Members.
copy.currencySelectorDiamond_postcard: ANYONE can use Pixie Diamonds to send Postcards!
copy.currencySelectorDiamond_giftset: Send Gift Sets to ANY player!
copy.currencySelectorIngredient_postcard: Only Members can use ingredients to send Postcards.
copy.currencySelectorIngredient_giftset: Send Gift Sets to Members Only.
